title: Can i preorder a skin?
body:
I will be going abroad on the 16th, but from what i understand patches come out about every 2 weeks.
This means the legacy skins that are coming out will probably be released on the 19th

Can i or is there a way that i could possibly pre order the skin i want?
If not does anyone have any idea on how i can buy the legacy skins when i leave?
Im not totally sure but where im going might not have internet and id really hate to miss these halow skins

replies.body:
Oh so lemme see now
when the skin comes out if i cant get in game but i have enough RP 

I can ask you guys to basically buy it for me from ticket?

> [{quoted}](name=Melody of Nights,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BpAAsiVr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-08T17:13:51.247+0000)
>
> Oh so lemme see now
> when the skin comes out if i cant get in game but i have enough RP 
> 
> I can ask you guys to basically buy it for me from ticket?

Yup!  No guarantees, we treat each case individually and help where we can.  Hope that helps!

I have no information on upcoming or legacy content, so I recommend bookmarking our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) in case something does come up.  If you won't be available to get in-game should that occur, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)-- after it's already available in the store.  Make sure you have enough currency on your account, and we may be able to help you out with your specific issue!  We got your back!
Wait, so if a skin is coming up, we can submit a ticket and you guys can credit it from our RP on our account?

> [{quoted}](name=Man In Sky,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BpAAsiVr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-08T16:33:21.095+0000)
>
> Wait, so if a skin is coming up, we can submit a ticket and you guys can credit it from our RP on our account?

We try to help when we can, but I can't make any guarantees.  If there's something up on the store, but you can't login to grab it, we're happy to see if we can offer any help!  This isn't a pre-order, but if it's already up we'll see if we can help.
Ok thanks thats quite a load of my chest for now c:
